commit.message:
unwind-dw2.c (uw_init_context_1): Don't pass &outer_cfa directly to _Unwind_SetGRPtr().

	* unwind-dw2.c (uw_init_context_1): Don't pass &outer_cfa directly
	to _Unwind_SetGRPtr().
